sentence.Network_en: I'm glad to find another true - hearted loyalist in this pestilent, rebellious city.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个遭瘟的反叛城市里能找到另一个真心实意忠于王室的义士,我很高兴.

sentence.Network_en: I destroy all noisome and rank weeds , I keep down all pestilent vapours.
sentence.Network_cn: 我摧毁了一切丛生的毒草,控制一切有害的烟雾.
天花是一种致命的疾病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin pestilens, pestilent- 'unhealthy, destructive', from pestis 'plague'

means.word_mean: 2. likely to spread and cause an epidemic disease;
